definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: surround, enclose (Ph. in deriv.; Ar. xadi/ara II. conceal, xidrun curtain concealing a person, chamber, house, or tent as concealing some one; Eth. xadara: dwell; v. also foll.)—only

definitions.title: Pt.
definitions.body: fs. [[הַחׂדֶ֫רֶת לָהֶם]] Ez Eze 21:19 that which surroundeth them (of the sword),—so SyrVer Thes Sm Co Da VB.
